title: Getting Started with Our Project
description: A comprehensive guide to getting started

body.raw:
# Welcome to Our Project

## Introduction

This is a sample MDX file demonstrating Contentlayer capabilities.

### Features

- Markdown support
- Code imports
- Custom components

## Code Example

```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet("World"));
```
